comment._content: This photograph is part of the Indicommons.org post The 1860s across the Commons.

comment.author: 7354134@N07
comment._content: Getting a lot of information now about the Mannings and the Townshends of Trevallyn. Also the Forbes, Marsh's Wise, Pinnocks etc. Trevallyn was a Townshend place first I think named after their place near Wrexham and Chester in England.
